title: Test statistic
text: The test statistic formula is $$X^2=\frac{\left(n-1\right) s^2}{q^2}$$, where $$q^2$$ is population variance.
speech: The test statistic formula is    x squared is equal to fraction, parentheses n minus 1,  times s squared, over, q squared,  , where  q squared  is population variance.

title: Test statistic
text: Let $$X^2$$ denote the test statistic, s denote sample standard deviation, and q denote population standard deviation. $$X^2=\frac{\left(n-1\right) s^2}{q^2}$$

title: Test statistic
